explains: adj. 夸张的，夸大的，言过其实的；（声音或动作）强调的，夸张的，引人注目的
v. 夸张，夸大（exaggerate 的过去式）

sentences.en: The story had been wildly exaggerated.
sentences.cn: 这件事被过分地夸大了。

sentences.en: The book is both inaccurate and exaggerated.
sentences.cn: 那本书既不准确又夸大事实。

sentences.en: Press reports have been grossly exaggerated.
